video.title: Made in Cartagena
video.synopsis: After his son dies during a botched sunken treasure heist, Harvey seeks revenge against the ringleader, using rising Champeta star Flora as bait.

episodes.synopsis: The world champeta dance championship takes place in Cartagena. No one knows that Harvey Noriega set up this distraction to steal the Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Harvey proposes Flora take on a fake persona to get close to Vicente and win his trust to find out where the Santa Helena is hidden.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The gang change Flora’s look to turn her into a high-class lady. In prison, Candelario meets El Titi, a dangerous criminal.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Maxi and Mireya manage to get into Vicente’s house looking for the Santa Helena. Harvey hires a shady lawyer to throw a wrench in Candelario’s case.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Watusi gets offended when Flora gives him some fashion advice and doesn’t let him go to the dance classes he’s started going to. Flora saves Sofía.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Sofía goes to the clinic after a blow to the head. Candelario takes the blueprint of the prison from one of the offices. Vicente visits his daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Flora visits Candelario in prison. Vicente and Imanol make a proposal to Candelario to turn in his accomplices. Harvey gets a house for Flora.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Flora finds out Vicente is thinking of transporting something valuable in armored cars and tells Harvey. Candelario asks Dixon to call a few friends.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Harvey asks Mireya to direct the assault on the trucks. Flora finds out the next world championship is at the same time as Sofía’s dance presentation.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Sofía invites Pablo to her house and they get intimate. Vicente comes in and catches them. Flora confronts Celina for changing the championship date.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Vicente runs into Flora, and he’s amazed by how beautiful she looks. Harvey and the gang plan an assault on the truck transporting the Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: With the audience’s support, the judges let Flora dance. Vicente and Imanol find footprints leading them to where the gang has the Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Harvey decides to send Bancoles’s money around the world, which scares the savers, who go to the main office to give him a piece of their mind.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Watusi makes a date to sleep with Celina. Flora takes Vicente for a walk on the beach and they see some champeta dancers. She tries to teach him.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Harvey orders an attack on Candelario in prison to put Flora in a bind and force her to keep playing Vicente for a fool. Vicente is suspended.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Flora accompanies Sofía to Vicente’s office at the bank and it’s a little bit strange for both of them. Watusi goes to tell Vicente he won the raffle.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Harvey and the gang plan to steal the Santa Helena from the gallery and they hide Aguamala in a sculpture. Sofía almost gets kidnapped buying drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Vicente apologizes to Flora for putting moves on her. Watusi shows Vicente around the neighborhood where the kids go for champeta dance lessons.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Harvey takes Vicente to his business and invites him out for a drink. Candelario comes to. Harvey tells Vicente about his son’s murder.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: The gang think Vicente did something to Harvey and they plan their revenge. Flora runs into Vicente, and Aguamala pretends to be her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Calvache finds out Harvey’s in the hospital and decides now’s a good time to send a hitman after him. Vicente invites Flora to Sofía’s birthday party.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Susana quits after a fight with Harvey. Flora takes Aguamala to Sofía’s birthday party. Vicente is captivated after seeing Flora in her bathing suit.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: The Champion finds Flora at Sofía’s party and goes looking for Watusi to tell him he saw her in her bathing suit. Titi stabs Candelario.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Candelario has to hide from the police, but first he asks to see Flora. Harvey has Susana locked up in the warehouse, and she decides to end it all.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Flora discusses the affair with Watusi and leaves him. Harvey’s gang plans to rob the Santa Helena at the exhibit. Mireya takes the Countess’s place.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Dixon finds out about Flora’s double life and argues with Belén. Mireya distracts the guards at the exhibit so Flora can grab the Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Flora has the Santa Helena. Harvey asks Dixon to work with him. Celina screams when she sees Sabroso unconscious as the gang celebrates the heist.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Flora decides to forget what’s happened. Calvache tells Harvey the Santa Helena is a fake. Vicente confesses to Silvia and Imanol it was counterfeit.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Calvache tells Harvey to hand over the club or the life of one of the gang members if he wants him to forgive him. Vicente has the real Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Silvia tells Vicente he can fulfill his role as president of Bancoles. Harvey asks Flora to get back into Domínguez’s life, and she hates him for it.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Calvache comes to where Candelario is hiding and gives him a “job offer”. Watusi takes it back, and Harvey says he paid for Sabroso’s surgery.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Flora is about to get the Santa Helena when Vicente and Sofía appear. Harvey orders Caresapo to kill Vicente. Mireya manages to wound Domínguez.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Watusi visits Vicente at the clinic and runs into Flora. Silvia thanks Watusi for his concern, and he confesses he was Flora’s boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Flora arrives at home and hears whistling, meaning that Candelario is around. Harvey pressures Watusi to give him the deeds to the Sabroso ranch.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Flora reads the letter Watusi left for her and confesses all she’s been through to Karen. Candelario decides to help Calvache, giving in to his anger.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Vicente goes into the studio with Torres and the Delegate safeguarding the Santa Helena until the exhibit. Flora does her job and manages to escape.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Candelario goes for the gang. Imanol finds out Dixon is Candelario’s brother and watches him day and night. Flora lets her feelings for Vicente flow.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Excitement fills the air at the Bazurto world championship. Everyone cheers for Celina and Watusi and boos Flora. Silvia has a fake Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Dixon tells Harvey that Imanol is watching him. Harvey gives Dixon the order to hide in the operations warehouse, and he fights with Candelario.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Candelario confesses to Harvey that Calvache knows the truth about Bazurto and avenges the death of his father. Silvia confirms Santa Helena is fake.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Flora and Watusi are the champeta champions, and the grand prize is a tour with El Rey de Rocha. Watusi thinks this could be their shot.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Candelario asks Dixon to use his skills to get at the camera Aguamala hid on the roof. Imanol tells Silvia he’s always loved her.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Sofía returns to Colombia and finds out Vicente is having an affair with Flora. Harvey plans to kill Calvache, and Candelario’s the man for the job.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Sofía confronts Flora for her affair with Vicente. Silvia decides to completely exclude him from any decisions concerning the Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Flora wants to tell Vicente the truth. She confesses to Candelario that she loves Domínguez. Silvia tells Watusi that Vicente and Flora are in love.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Sofía argues with Vicente about his relationship with Flora and leaves the house. Sombra kills Calvache and gives Harvey an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Harvey convinces the gang to attack the Santa Helena. Aguamala finds out Mireya killed Robinson. Flora can’t bring herself to confess to Vicente.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Flora hides the Santa Helena to keep it from getting captured. Sombra rescues a badly injured Maxi on the beach. Harvey’s body is taken to the club.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Candelario has the Santa Helena and pressures Mireya to get him the other half of the treasure in Harvey’s possession. Silvia fires Imanol and Flora.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Candelario sets his plan in motion to get his revenge against those who betrayed him, and the first blow is against Mireya, involving a certain video.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Karen tells Watusi the whole truth about Flora and Imanol insists on revealing her true identity. The Díaz family gathers at the cemetery.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Candelario proposes a deal with Harvey for the Santa Helena, but Dixon shows up and the situation goes out of control. Vicente wants revenge on Flora.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Watusi and Sofía try to stop Flora and Vicente’s wedding. Harvey has a business proposal for Sombra. She demands Candelario give her the Santa Helena.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Vicente Domínguez identifies the murdered body of his nephew Marcos, and the prime suspect is Dixon Díaz. The doctor says Sofía is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Candelario asks Flora to move forward with stealing the Santa Helena because their lives are in danger, but she refuses to keep lying to Domínguez.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Harvey has to dress up like a woman to get Mireya out of there. Flora wants to turn herself in to protect her mother, but Vicente stops her.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Harvey gets Mireya out of jail, and in order to return to Cartagena with Caresapo, they steal a religious relic. Flora tries to save the championship.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Vicente Domínguez lets Candelario take the Santa Helena and give it to Sombra, but just then, the police arrive. Caresapo wants to kill Flora.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Karen shows Sofía the video of Flora apologizing to Vicente. Candelario and Dixon decide to cooperate with the police. The gang kidnap Sofía.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: The bank refuses to give Vicente the Santa Helena to negotiate for the life of his daughter. Vicente considers stealing the treasure.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Vicente, Silvia, and Imanol go after the Santa Helena, but the police find out and try to stop them. Flora helps Vicente escape from the bank with it.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Vicente and Flora go after Harvey after giving him the Santa Helena. Imanol and Silvia are put in prison. Dixon tells Harvey Mireya killed Robinson.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Flora turns herself in to the police, who ask her to help them catch Noriega. A fisherman finds Vicente. He and Flora reunite and forgive each other.
episodes.title: Episode 63
